testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Andrew Irorere must be one of the most brilliant and hardworking developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
